articles.author: Katie Sewell
articles.title: Princess Anne tribute: Anne to receive same prestigious honour as brother Prince Charles - Express
articles.description: PRINCESS ANNE will receive the same honour as her brother, Prince Charles, when she celebrates her 70th birthday this year.
